page.title: 18 SOCIAL CONCERN OF LITCHAM
page.content: Although Litcham can be a bit too quiet the majority of people wouldn't want to live in a town.Many children imagined towns to be full of rough children on dirty street corners,and would prefer to stay in Litcham.Older people would like to live nearer to a town to save time shopping but wouldn't want the noise and bustle of a city. Many people have lived in Litcham for over ten years,and those who haven't don't seem to be planning on moving.It is known that people are moving in to East Anglia more than most other counties.In Litcham the people moving in are mostly elderly.The people in this area have a friendly reputation.
